hero.electDesc: Certified electricians for home and office electrical work.
hero.plumbDesc: Get expert plumbing solutions quickly and affordably.
hero.CarpDesc: Custom furniture and woodwork by skilled carpenters.

section.electDesc: Our certified electricians provide expert electrical services including safe wiring, modern lighting installations, appliance fittings, fault diagnosis, and regular maintenance for homes, offices, and commercial setups. Ensuring quality, safety, and reliability is our top priority.
section.plumbDesc: We offer professional plumbing services including leak detection and repair, pipe installations, drainage system setup, bathroom and kitchen fittings, and complete water system maintenance. Our team ensures prompt service, high-quality materials, and long-lasting solutions for residential and commercial properties.
section.carpDesc: Our skilled carpenters specialize in custom furniture making, woodwork repairs, structural carpentry, door and window installations, and decorative wood finishes. From modern to traditional designs, we deliver craftsmanship that enhances both functionality and aesthetics for your living or work space.
section.acDesc: Stay cool year-round with our reliable AC repair services. We handle air conditioner installations, gas refilling, deep cleaning, filter replacements, and troubleshooting for all major brands. Count on us for efficient, affordable cooling system care with quick response times.
section.solarDesc: Go green with our solar technician services. We provide solar panel setup, inverter installations, renewable energy consultations, and complete maintenance to ensure optimal energy generation. Save on electricity bills while contributing to a sustainable future with our expert solar solutions.

howItWorks.chooseDesc: Select from various services like electrician, plumbing, carpentry, AC repair, or solar setup.
howItWorks.bookDesc: Schedule a convenient time online or via phone. Quick confirmation guaranteed.
howItWorks.getDesc: Our professional visits your location fully prepared and completes the job efficiently.
howItWorks.completeDesc: Job done! Review, provide feedback, and enjoy your hassle-free experience.

WhyChooseUs.heading: Why Choose Us
WhyChooseUs.intro: In the past, you had to search for electricians or plumbers by visiting shops and explaining your issue. Now, we’ve made it all digital. Find professionals, book instantly, and get things fixed—without leaving your home.
WhyChooseUs.instantAccessDesc: No need to visit shops. Find electricians, plumbers, and technicians directly through our app.
WhyChooseUs.verifiedProfessionalsDesc: We connect you only with trusted service providers so you get quality work at your doorstep.
WhyChooseUs.easyBookingDesc: Choose service, select time, and confirm—all from your mobile or desktop within minutes.
WhyChooseUs.timeSavingDesc: Save your valuable time and effort. Let service providers come to you instead of going to them.

faqs.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.q1: Can we register as a service provider?
faqs.ans1: Yes, you can register as a service provider by filling up the form for becoming a provider. Just click on Become Ustaz and complete your registration.
faqs.ans2: We accept payments via digital wallets like JazzCash and EasyPaisa, direct bank transfer, and hand-to-hand cash payment after service completion.
faqs.ans3: Simply select the service, choose your preferred time slot, fill in your contact details, and confirm the booking through our website or app.

footer.tagline: Your trusted digital platform for electricians, plumbers, AC repair, and solar services—all in one place.

meta.title: About Ustaz | Trusted Home Services in Pakistan
meta.description: Discover Ustaz – Pakistan’s leading digital home services platform. Learn about our story, leadership, and how we’re transforming household solutions with reliable professionals.
meta.keywords: Home Services Pakistan, Plumbing, Electricians, Handyman, Ustaz, Home Repairs, Emergency Fix, Local Services Pakistan

hero.title: Ustaz — Your Home, Handled
hero.subtitle: Pakistan’s most trusted platform for fast, reliable, and verified home service solutions.

story.heading: Who We Are
story.paragraph1: Ustaz was founded with a single mission — to eliminate the frustration of unreliable household services in Pakistan. From urgent plumbing and electrical issues to routine maintenance, Ustaz connects you to vetted professionals at your convenience.
story.paragraph2: More than just a service app, Ustaz is a promise of safety, reliability, and speed for your home. Every technician is background-checked, trained, and customer-reviewed to ensure peace of mind.

leadership.heading: Meet Our Leadership
leadership.description: The Ustaz leadership brings innovation, experience, and a relentless drive to revolutionize how home services work in Pakistan.

missionVision.missionText: To deliver dependable, fast, and tech-enabled home services with verified local professionals.
missionVision.visionText: To become the most trusted and efficient household service platform in South Asia.
missionVision.valuesText: Integrity, accountability, skilled service, and customer satisfaction in every task.

cta.title: Need Urgent Home Service?
cta.subtitle: Our verified experts are just a message away — ready to help across Pakistan.
